alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; South End San Joaquin Valley; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 19 at 3:54PM PST until December 21 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected in and right below mountain areas. Gusts up to 35 mph are possible in the Bakersfield area. * WHERE...Bakersfield, Frazier Mountain Communities, Grapevine, South End San Joaquin Valley, and Tehachapi. * WHEN...From 4 AM Wednesday to 1 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust can significantly reduce visibility. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Bakersfield; Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; South End San Joaquin Valley; Tehachapi
